# Democratic Republic of the Congo at the 2015 African Games

The Democratic Republic of the Congo at the 2015 All-Africa Games had athletes competing in taekwondo, table tennis, swimming, athletics, karate, badminton, cycling, basketball, boxing, judo and volleyball.
Tennis player Denis Indondo became the first DRC athlete to win a gold medal in the African Games since the Congolese boxer Jesus Kibunde had won a gold at the 1999 edition of the Games.[https://www.bbc.com/afrique/sports/2015/09/150917_rdc_indondo Indondo offre une médaille d’or à la RDC] .
